name: Dudes with Attitude [NES]
description:
Smash your way to fun with this unique multiplayer game where bigger is better!

A band of wacky Monster friends got lost on an intergalactic road trip but when they picked up music and video broadcasts from our planet, they decided it was so cool they had to come visit!

But these mischievous Monsters decided to turn our planet into their playground, knocking each other about and bashing buildings to prove who is the strongest of the bunch!

Choose your favorite Monster and challenge other players from around the world in a free-for-all brawl! Bash everything in the arena to help you grow, from the buildings to trees to other Monsters. The more you smash, the bigger you grow, and the bigger you grow, the more you win!

Find hidden power-ups like shields, nukes and... balloons(!?) to take on even the biggest Monsters. Gather the whole gang, try their different abilities, and upgrade them while you fight your way up the leaderboards!

FEATURES
• SMASHY fun meets IO gameplay
• FAST-PACED real-time matches with 8 players on a planetary arena
• GROW by bashing your environment and out-playing your opponents
• COLLECT unique Monsters, each with their own attitude and strengths
• UPGRADE your Monster gang and their abilities to become stronger
